title: ER REGISTAR Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Tift Regional Health System in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: First interview was conducted over the phone. About 20 minutes with situational questions. Second interview was about two weeks later and was with a 3 person peer group. Asked situational  questions.
Interview Questions: Why are you choosing a new career path?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Tift Regional Health System
Interview Descriptions: I had a great interview process. They staff was friendly and answered all my questions. If I wasn’t moving I would have taken the position. I highly suggest the facility as a entry level job.
Interview Questions: Schedule was a question they asked

title: Patient Access Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Tift Regional Health System (Tifton, GA) in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: Very easy and challenging at the same time! I did 2 group interviews within a week a part. Everyone was so friendly and honest. I was having a bad day but after the interviews I was very cheerful. They was very honest with expectations for the job!
Interview Questions: What makes me a great fit for the position?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Tift Regional Health System
Interview Descriptions: HR called to set up a phone interview a few hours after I had submitted my application. The phone interview was scheduled for the next day and I was offered the position shortly afterwords.
Interview Questions: What was my role if working on a team?

title: Register Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Tift Regional Health System (Tifton, GA)
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, interview was complete with many different head of departments. The interview was very intense and hard.  At the end of the interview they told me that they’d contact me if they wish to move forward with the hiring process

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Tift Regional Health System (Tifton, GA) in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions:
Great and professional interview.  Panel was great. Questions were fair. Everything looked like it was prepared the professional way 
Great and professional interview.  Panel was great. Questions were fair. Everything looked like it was prepared the professional way

title: Guest Ambassador Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Tift Regional Health System (Tifton, GA) in Oct 2017
Interview Descriptions: It’s a two part interview first one with just supervisor and manager next one is a peer review with 3 other managers. The questions are the same for both interviews but peer review is tough because you have to go in depth with responses.
Interview Questions: When is a time you went above and beyond? Explain.

title: Registrar Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Tift Regional Health System (Tifton, GA) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: The interview went very well.  Although, I was ready to be hired that day, their process takes longer than I anticipated. If you are chosen then you have to be interviewed by the department manager. After that, you may or may not have to be interviewed by your co-workers.
Interview Questions: Why did I want to work for Tift Regional

title: Applications Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Tift Regional Health System (Tifton, GA)
Interview Descriptions: Conference room with 8-10 people around the table. Behavioral questions are common. Individuals from different departments were present and all asked questions.  The mood was tense and serious, it wasn't laid back.
Interview Questions: Name a time you had a conflict with a coworker and how did you resolve it?

title: Licensed Practical Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Tift Regional Health System (Tifton, GA) in Jul 2015
Interview Descriptions: Very  comfortable, through interview. I did not feel nervous about the questions being ask or interview panel. The process of testing for insurance and work area knowledge was a little more difficult and time consuming.

title: Housekeeper Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Tift Regional Health System (Tifton, GA) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: The first she did was look over my applicant and decided to call me in for a interview to see how my attitude was toward as well how i get along with the co-worker,so that when made a decisions to give the opporunity to join the company.
Interview Questions: have you did this kind of job before

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Tift Regional Health System (Tifton, GA) in Apr 2014
Interview Descriptions: The initial interview is with the Human Resources Manager.  If you meet all the qualifications for the job a group panel interview with 5 department managers is scheduled. any departments that are interested in hiring you will then make an offer and you choose which job you will take. Once an offer is accepted, they will schedule a day for you to complete physical, drug test and background check.
Interview Questions: describe how you handle a stress
